uvi.product_version: versions from v3.13 to before v4.14.252
uvi.description:
NFC: digital: fix possible memory leak in digital_tg_listen_mdaa()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.252 by commit b7b023e6ff567e991c31cd425b0e1d16779c938b, it was introduced in version v3.13 by commit 1c7a4c24fbfd99442cc6e14dc80fcb00f118e8b8. For more details please see the references link.
